actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects Representative Neil Abercrombie, of Hawaii, to the House Committee on Armed Services; Representative Mario Biaggi, of New York, to the House Committee on Public Works and Transportation; and Representative Charles W. Stenholm, of Texas, to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.
